Meeting Text:
Spent the day at work. Was aboard the Williamsburg with secretaries and miltary [sic] and naval aides, and Adm[iral] Leahy. Had a most pleasant evening-and so did everyone, apparently. Went 
to bed at 1:30 A.M. tomorrow after Chief Ph[ysician's] M[a]t[e]. Taylor 
gave me a good and thorough rub down.
